module.name: avm-res-network-dnsresolver
module.description: Terraform Azure Verified Resource Module for DNS Resolver

inputs.name: lock
inbound_endpoints
inputs.type:
map(object({
    name                         = optional(string)
    subnet_name                  = string
    private_ip_allocation_method = optional(string, "Dynamic")
    private_ip_address           = optional(string, null)
    tags                         = optional(map(string), null)
    merge_with_module_tags       = optional(bool, true)
  }))

inputs.name: outbound_endpoints
role_assignments
inputs.type:
map(object({
    role_definition_id_or_name             = string
    principal_id                           = string
    description                            = optional(string, null)
    skip_service_principal_aad_check       = optional(bool, false)
    condition                              = optional(string, null)
    condition_version                      = optional(string, null)
    delegated_managed_identity_resource_id = optional(string, null)
    principal_type                         = optional(string, null)
  }))

outputs.name: resource
outputs.description: This is the full output for the resource.

outputs.name: resource_id
outputs.description: The ID of the DNS resolver.

outputs.name: forwarding_rulesets
outputs.description: The forwarding rulesets of the DNS resolver.

outputs.name: inbound_endpoint_ips
outputs.description: The IP addresses of the inbound endpoints.

outputs.name: inbound_endpoints
outputs.description: The inbound endpoints of the DNS resolver.

outputs.name: name
outputs.description: The name of the DNS resolver.

outputs.name: outbound_endpoints
outputs.description: The outbound endpoints of the DNS resolver.
